document.forum_title: Local Obituaries from KMOV.com and Tributes.com
document.discussion_title: Elizabeth A. Nadler, 62, New Athens, Illinois
document.topic_text: Light A Candle Elizabeth A . Nadler , 62, of New Athens, IL, born September 30th, 1953 in Belleville, IL, passed away Saturday, August 20th at St. Louis University Hospital in St. Louis, MO. Ms. Nadler was a member of St. John United Church of Christ in New Athens, IL. She was a CNA but had also previously worked in the housekeeping department at the New Athens Home for the Aged in New Athens, IL She loved to bake; especially pies and her famous sugar cookies. Elizabeth was preceded in death by her parents; Harold A . "Brown Eyes" and Meridene E. (Berthold) Nadler . Ms. Nadler is survived by her children; Denise (Casey) Gann of Arnold, MO and Derek (Rebecca) Galle of Marissa, 2 grandchildren; Davin and Clayton Galle, 2 brothers; James "Safety" (Linda) Galle of New Athens, IL and George (Kathy) Nadler of Mancelona, Michigan. Memorials may be made to the family. Visitation; Friends may call from 9 to 11 a.m. on Saturday, August 27, 2016 at St. John United Church of Christ in New Athens, IL. Funeral: Memorial services will be held at 11 a.m. on Saturday, August 27, 2016 at St. John United Church of Christ in New Athens, IL with the Rev. Dr. Robert Koch officiating. Private burial will follow at St. Peter United Church of Christ Cemetery in Lenzburg, IL. Create An Online Memorial For Elizabeth A. Nadler The beautiful and interactive Eternal Tribute tells Elizabeth's life story the way it deserves to be told in words , pictures and video . Create an online memorial to tell that story for generations to come, creating a permanent place for family and friends to honor the memory of your loved one. Select An Online Memorial Product:
